LogVisibility.description: Controls who can read canister logs.

oneOf.description: Simple log visibility: 'controllers' (only controllers can view) or 'public' (anyone can view)
Specific principals that can view logs

allowed_viewers.description: List of principal IDs that can view canister logs

items.description: A principal ID that can view logs

Settings.description: Canister settings, such as compute and memory allocation.

compute_allocation.description: Compute allocation (0 to 100). Represents guaranteed compute capacity.

environment_variables.description:
Environment variables for the canister as key-value pairs.
These variables are accessible within the canister and can be used to configure
behavior without hardcoding values in the WASM module.

freezing_threshold.description: Freezing threshold in seconds. Controls how long a canister can be inactive before being frozen.

log_visibility.description: Controls who can read canister logs.

memory_allocation.description: Memory allocation in bytes. If unset, memory is allocated dynamically.

reserved_cycles_limit.description: Reserved cycles limit. If set, the canister cannot consume more than this many cycles.

wasm_memory_limit.description: Wasm memory limit in bytes. Sets an upper bound for Wasm heap growth.

wasm_memory_threshold.description: Wasm memory threshold in bytes. Triggers a callback when exceeded.

canisters.description:
An optional list of the canisters to be included in this environments.
Defaults to all the canisters if not specified.

init_args.description: Override init args for specific canisters in this environment

network.description:
The target network for canister deployment.
Defaults to the `local` network if not specified

settings.description: Override the canister settings for this environment
